Title: Boys Brigade
Description: The Boys' Brigade provides a balanced programme of activities for children and young people from 5 to 18 years old. The Anchor Section is the youngest section in the BB and is for children aged between 5 and 8.  Activities include making things, crafts, music,…

Title: Rainbows, Brownies, Girl Guides
Description: Rainbows is our section for girls aged five to seven (four to seven in Northern Ireland). Rainbows is all about developing self-confidence, building friendships, learning new things and having fun. Brownies is our section for girls aged seven to ten. Title: Scouts
Schedule: Various times, contact the individual clubs for details
Description: Scouting provides fun activities and personal development skills for young people between 6 and 18 years to enjoy.  To find your nearest group go to Scouts and enter your postcode.

Title: Sea Cadets
